title: IPv6 Notation Converter
description: Convert between compressed and expanded IPv6 notation formats with validation.

input.label: IPv6 Address
input.help: Enter IPv6 address in any valid format
input.tooltipExpand: Enter compressed IPv6 address to expand
input.tooltipCompress: Enter expanded IPv6 address to compress

info.title: IPv6 Notation Formats
info.expanded: Expanded: All 32 hexadecimal digits with leading zeros
info.compressed: Compressed: Shortened using :: for consecutive zero groups
info.rules: RFC 4291 defines the standard representation formats
